alert.note: Alert for Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued November 17 at 3:56PM EST until November 18 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Key West
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT... * WHAT...Saltwater flooding. * WHERE...Upper Florida Keys. * WHEN...Through late Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Saltwater flooding of low elevation streets and lots is expected. Some storm drains will overflow, and some seawalls and docks will be overtopped. Boaters can expect less clearance under fixed bridges. Motorists should remember that persistent puddles are almost certain to contain a mix of saltwater.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
